definition: play in which children pretend to put out a fire
details:
noun
- play in which children pretend to put out a fire
- a member of a fire department who tries to extinguish fires
= synonyms: fire-eater, firefighter, fire fighter
- a pitcher who does not start the game
= synonyms: reliever, relief pitcher
- a laborer who tends fires (as on a coal-fired train or steamship)
= synonyms: stoker
